channel.title: DnB snare for chill liquid funk?
channel.description: I’ve been searching far and wide for a good chill liquid DnB snare, and I’m very unsuccessful lol. Any ideas?

item.title: DnB snare for chill liquid funk?
item.dc:creator: AnirudhKhanna
item.description:
I got you. I have a good collection for snares.
If you’re making something liquid and chill, try to use a percussion/woodblock sounding hit as the snare like this: https://app.auxy.co/projects/Glp4JHlaj4OXgqKlYMCboA== (dont steal melodies lol)

If that doesn’t work, maybe try going for a vintage snare for a more funky taste. That’s just my opinion, but I think it sounds really nice and fresh.

(note: this is all my opinion lol)

Read full topic
